artist: Designer: Kristina Vaughn Jones; Maker: Heal's Fabrics
description: Four repeats of pattern; large and smaller flower image in pink, rose, orange, brown and tan on a white ground with brown and greenish brown stalks and leaves
image_copyright: © Heal%27s Fabrics%2C London%2C Kristina Vaughn Jones%2C 1963
markings: \'\'SUMMERTIME\' by Kristina Vaughn Jones\', \'WOVEN & PRINTED IN ENGLAND\', printed in white borders to either side
text: This design incorporates the softer, more impressionistic view of floral imagery often adapted by traditional designers. The composition anticipates the bolder, larger than life motifs embraced in the early 1970's.
title: Summertime
